transcript: if you want to become a different person and change your environment because the environment you have is reinforcing the person you used to be there's a quote Chris Williamson said people root for you on your way up because you remind them of their dreams and they try to tear you down once you're there because you remind them that they gave up on them I have lived that but then what happens is people who are not from your hometown start recognizing for who you are now there's a say that Jesus wasn't the Messiah in his hometown you'd think that the place that someone was from is the place that would root for it is the last place that accepted him as Lord in the story I think there's a lot of Truth to that it's also why I'm a big advocate of leaving
